items.sentence: When I speak French, most of the people in the room don\'t understand me.
As soon as Tom got on the train and found a place to sit, he fell asleep.
I was the only one at the meeting who didn\'t think that was a good idea.
I\'ve never been the kind of person who complains about things like that.
I\'ve heard that it\'s dangerous to walk alone on Park Street after dark.
